name: PongPlus
description:
This game was made for Not A GameJam 2

The project was not finished and i currently have no plan to finish it

Bored of playing Pong ? Try the new PongPlus and challenge your friends with the new PowerUps !

(Only one PowerUp at the moment, you get a new one every 20 seconds)

Controls:

Left Player

E/D - Up/Down

R or Space - Use PowerUp

Right Player

Up arrow/Down arrow - Up/Down

Numpad 0 or Left Ctrl - Use PowerUp
